metadata.metaValue:
Here we search topside faces for their edges that were created along the cut. This will be used to construct cross section faces

We chose topside faces because we know they will be going in the right direction for a bottom side cross section face.

By subtracting all the edge's end verts, we're left with only start verts which do not appear in the end verts. 

i.e. the starting point of cross section edge loops which are open
Build faces till we run out
Should always be true since we filtered the open in prev step
